warranty_policy_description: At SIAMTECH, we stand behind the quality of our products. All our equipment comes with a 1-year standard warranty that covers manufacturing defects and malfunctions.
coverage_details_list_2: Coverage includes manufacturing defects and malfunctions
coverage_details_list_3: Free repair or replacement of defective parts
coverage_details_list_4: Technical support throughout the warranty period
activate_warranty_description: Ready to activate your warranty? Sign in to your account and register your product to get started.
extended_warranty_description: Protect your investment further with our extended warranty plans:
premium_protection_description: Extends coverage to 2 years with priority service
our_story_content: From our humble beginnings in Bangkok, SIAMTECH has evolved into a leading provider of professional audio equipment and accessories. What started as a small shop in the heart of Thailand has grown into an international brand trusted by audio professionals, content creators, and enthusiasts worldwide.
our_mission_content: Our mission is to democratize access to professional-grade audio equipment. We believe that quality sound shouldn't be a luxury, but a standard. Through innovative products and exceptional service, we're making professional audio accessible to everyone who shares our passion for perfect sound.
join_journey_description: Whether you're a professional audio engineer, a content creator, or simply passionate about quality sound, we invite you to be part of our story. Let's create the future of audio together.

warranty_registration_description: Please fill in your product details to activate the warranty
faq_coverage_answer: Our standard warranty covers manufacturing defects and malfunctions under normal use conditions. This includes issues with components, electronics, and other hardware failures not caused by user damage.
faq_period_question: How long is the warranty period?
faq_period_answer: All SIAMTECH products come with a 1-year standard warranty from the date of purchase. Extended warranty options may be available for select products.
faq_claim_question: How do I make a warranty claim?
faq_claim_answer: To make a warranty claim, please contact our customer support team with your product details and proof of purchase. You can reach us through the Support page or by emailing support@siamtech.com.
faq_void_answer: The warranty is voided by physical damage, water damage, unauthorized repairs or modifications, improper use, or if the product's serial number has been removed or altered.
faq_transfer_answer: No, our warranty is non-transferable and applies only to the original purchaser with valid proof of purchase.
faq_international_answer: Yes, our warranty is valid internationally. However, shipping costs for warranty service may vary depending on your location.
